sentences.en: " That is, I live at Columbia City.
sentences.cn: " 你知道, 我就住在哥伦比亚城.

sentences.en: " What can you do back at Columbia City? "
sentences.cn: “ 你回到哥伦比亚城,又能干些什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: All together, Columbia has 23 sitcoms in syndication.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚广播公司一共有23部情景喜剧在非联网电视台市场播放。

sentences.en: Columbia City and the better side of her home life came back.
sentences.cn: 她又想到了哥伦比亚城,想到老家的好处.

sentences.en: Columbia City, what was there for her?
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚城, 那地方有什么适合她的事 呢 ?

sentences.en: Columbia Pictures paid him a six-figure sum for the film rights.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚影业公司付给他一笔6位数的电影版权费。

sentences.en: Columbia recently resigned the band for a cool $30 million.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚唱片公司最近以3,000万美元的高价再次签下这个乐队。

sentences.en: Columbia was a young city compared to venerable Charleston.
sentences.cn: 与历史悠久的查尔斯顿相比，哥伦比亚是个年轻的城市。

sentences.en: Ecuador lies between Columbia, Peru, and the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.cn: 厄瓜多尔位于哥伦比亚 、 秘鲁和太平洋之间.

sentences.en: He received a doctorate of philosophy in political science at Columbia University.
sentences.cn: 他获哥伦比亚大学政治学博士学位.

sentences.en: I ran straight up to Columbia County, then turned East, came down the Harlem Valley and thence home.
sentences.cn: 我一直跑到哥伦比亚县，然后向东转，沿着哈勒姆山谷，从那里回到家。

sentences.en: In 1498, Columbus ever been to Columbia coast.
sentences.cn: 1498年，哥伦布曾到过哥伦比亚海岸。
“哥伦比亚”号宇宙飞船昨天着陆。

sentences.en: The Washougal empties into the Columbia River near Portland.
sentences.cn: 沃舒格尔河在波特兰附近注入哥伦比亚河。

sentences.en: This morning's launch of the space shuttle Columbia has been delayed.
sentences.cn: 原定今早“哥伦比亚”号航天飞机的发射已被推迟.

sentences.en: Vicky and Gary attended the graduation exercises at Columbia.
sentences.cn: 维基和加里参加了哥伦比亚大学的毕业典礼。

sentences.en: Well, I might want to go to Columbia. But I might not.
sentences.cn: 我可能想去读哥伦比亚大学，但也可能不想。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 不列颠哥伦比亚（省名，位于加拿大西部）
n. （美国纽约州）哥伦比亚大学
哥伦比亚特区（美国联邦直辖区）

trans.tran_en: the first test vehicle of the NASA space shuttle fleet to prove the possibility of routine access to space for scientific and commercial ventures
